name: 🌱
description:
a roguelike with emoji support. craft potions and throw them onto enemies!

commands:

  • arrows, numpad or yuihkbnm to move 
  • C to chat
  • T to throw
  • P to plant
  • Q to quaff potion
  • S to enter stairs
  • , (comma) to pick up plants
  • in the craft menu, left/right to select plant, Z to insert plant, Enter to craft potion
